articles.author: Paul Tassi
articles.title: Outrage Ensues As Netflix Cancels ‘Shadow And Bone,’ Rejects ‘Six Of Crows’ - Forbes
articles.description: It has been a little while since we’ve had a “Netflix cancels beloved show” firestorm, but the streaming service has stumbled into infuriating another fanbase with the cancellation of Shadow and Bone and killing the hope for its spin-off, Six of Crows.
articles.content:
